alert.note: Alert for Northern Calcasieu; Southern Calcasieu; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 6:04PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL CAMERON AND WESTERN CALCASIEU PARISHES THROUGH 630 PM CST... At 604 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vinton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Vinton, Carlyss, Buhler, Toomey, Edgerly, and Hackberry. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 4 and 28. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Calcasieu; Southern Calcasieu; West Cameron
